data.title: FASID Table MET 2A - ICAO - International Civil Aviation Organization
data.meta_description: FASID Table MET 2A - ICAO - International Civil Aviation Organization
data.text: International Civil Aviation Organization Record of Amendments to FASID Tables MET1A and MET2A CreationDate Type Region Pages Affected 25/02/2008 1A and 2A All regions Overall review due to the introduction of OPMET databases. 23/10/2008 1A and 2A All regions Overall reformatting to cater for the inclusion of 30-hour TAF, the elimination of overlapping TAF and the indication of the availability of OPMET data. 31/10/2008 1A and 2A ASIAPAC Australia 31/10/2008 1A and 2A EUR Italy 13/11/2008 1A and 2A AFI Requirements for 30-hour TAF in the AFI Region reviewed 15/12/2008 1A and 2A ASIAPAC Republic of Korea: Addition of Maun aerodrome 18/12/2008 1A and 2A MID Update based on Amendment MID 08/5 15/01/2009 1A and 2A ASIAPAC Update based on Amendment APAC 08/31 23/01/2009 1A and 2A ASIAPAC Update to the requirments for Niue (New Zealand) 27/01/2009 2A CARSAM Update to Argentina, Chile, Colombia, Peru and Urguay based on SADISOPSG Conclusion 13/9 27/01/2009 1A and 2A AFI Update to Nigeria based on Amendment WACAF 08/02 30/01/2009 1A and 2A ASIAPAC Update to Viet Nam based on Amendment APAC 08/32 18/03/2009 2A NAM Northern Mariana Island: PGWT (non-AOP aerodrome) reclassified under PAC Region (instead of NAM Region) 18/03/2009 1A and 2A ASIAPAC Thailand (VTBS): requirement for METAR included 11/05/2009 1A and 2A All regions Updates to China, Germany, Greece, Netherlands, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland and Israel regarding requirements for METAR/SPECI 20/05/2009 1A ASIAPAC Update based on Amendment APAC 09/1 19/08/2009 1A and 2A AFI Update based on Amendment WACAF 09/01 (12 States affected) 20/08/2009 1A and 2A ASIAPAC Update based on Amendment APAC 09/07 (8 States affected) 04/09/2009 1A and 2A CARSAM Update based on Amendment CAR/SAM 09/02-MET (20 States affected, mostly in the CAR Region) 04/09/2009 1A and 2A ASIAPAC Australia, India, Malaysia, Midway, N. Mariana Is., Philippines, Samoa, Thailand, Vietnam, Wallis and Futuna Is. (T4/1.2.1: AP085/09) 15/10/2009 2A EUR Non-AOP aerodromes: Germany (addition of EDJA); UK (addition of EGHQ; adjustment of requirements for EGAE) 15/10/2009 1A and 2A CARSAM Puerto Rico: Saint Kitts and Nevis; and Virgin Islands (US): change of the responsible MET Offices; UK: requirements for EGYP changed 15/10/2009 2A AFI Ascension Island (UK): change of requirements for METAR/SPECI 15/10/2009 1A and 2A ASIAPAC Non-AOP aerodromes: Australia (addition of YCFC, YHID, YWLM); French Polynesia (deletion of NTGG); India (addition of VOBL, VOHS); Philippines (adjustment of availability of OPMET data); AOP aerodromes: NZ: change of resp. MET office 19/10/2009 2A EUR Non-AOP aerodromes: Sweden (addition of ESUT, ESGL, ESCF, ESIB, ESGR, ESNY, ESPE) 10/11/2009 1A and 2A ASIAPAC Update based on Amendment APAC 09/17-MET (Bangladesh, India, Maldives, Pakistan, Sri Lanka, United States) 10/11/2009 1A and 2A EUR Update based on Amendment EUR/NAT 09/11-AOP/MET (Germany: deletion of Berlin Tempelhof) 10/11/2009 2A CARSAM Non-AOP aerodromes: Argentina (addition of SARC, SARL, SAOC, SAWE) and Bolivia (addition of SLSI, SLSA, SLVM, SLYA) 10/11/2009 2A EUR Non-AOP aerodromes: United Kingdom (deletion of EGDG, EGNW) 20/11/2009 2A CARSAM Non-AOP aerodromes: Columbia (addition of SKMD, SKSM); Puerto Rico (deletion of TJNR) changes in availability in Bolivia, Dominica, Mexico and Peru 28/11/2011 1
